charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking in town
one day when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] spotted Jacq and Farigiraf
together.
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_0300: Pasio is such a lovely place, isn’t it?
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_0400:
There aren’t any wild Pokémon, but everyone
brings such a variety along with them.
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_0500:
That’s why you can meet so many different kinds
just by walking around town.
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_0600: For example, that Pikachu with you...
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_0700:
Pikachu has a wide habitation area, so you can
see them in a lot of different regions.
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_0800:
But even if they might look like the same, if you
check veeery carefully, you’ll find that they have
differences based on region.
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_0900: Maybe your Pikachu could also be—
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_1000:
Oops, sorry! Ex-researcher habits die hard,
I suppose.
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_1100:
You might already know this, but I’m currently a
biology teacher in the Paldea region.
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_1200:
I love talking about Pokémon, and I wanted to
encourage more people to like them too.
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_1300: So maybe I was meant to be a teacher.
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_0401_1500: Sure, I can happily go on!
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_0302_1600: What sorts of things do you teach?
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_1800:
Well then, let’s have a special lesson about
Farigiraf.
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_1900:
Girafarig, the Pokémon which evolves into
Farigiraf, has a brain in its head and another in
its tail.
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_2000:
That said, the brain in the tail is small, so it’s
only in charge of simple things like spatial
awareness.
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_2100:
But when Girafarig evolves, its two sets of brain
waves sync up, and its psychic power grows
10 times stronger!
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_2200:
Mysterious happenings like this are what make
Pokémon so fascinating!
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_2300:
I think this gives us an important way to think
about us people, too.
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_2400:
For example, think of when you face a difficult
problem.
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_2500:
Do you split up responsibilities among your friends
and try to find a solution separately like Girafarig?
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_2600:
Or do you work with them and face the problem
together like Farigiraf?
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_2700:
Let’s say those are the two options for solving the
problem.
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_0401_3000:
I see. People do have different strengths and
weaknesses, so that may be the more effective
approach.
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_0402_3200:
I see. We might be weak as individuals, but by
working together with others, we can be stronger.
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_3300:
I respect your choice of method,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_3400:
But don’t forget—both approaches depend on you
having friends that you can count on!
charaepi_ch0298_00_zinnia/2301_1201_3500: So make sure you keep on taking care of them!
